snippet: The report suggested that as many as 27 percent of the 37 million borrowers have past-due balances of 30 days or more.
abstract: Federal Reserve Bank of New York report suggests that as many as 27 percent of the 37 million college student and graduate borrowers of student loans have past-due balances of 30 days or more; says total student loans balance is $870 billion.

byline.original: By ANDREW MARTIN and RON LIEBER

lead_paragraph: The report suggested that as many as 27 percent of the 37 million borrowers have past-due balances of 30 days or more.

headline.seo: Study Finds a Growing Student Debt Load
headline.main: Fed Study of Student Debt Outlines a Growing Burden
headline.print_headline: Fed Study of Student Debt Outlines a Growing Burden

keywords.value: Federal Reserve Bank of New York
keywords.name: organizations
